name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Jay J. DRUSS, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Jay J. DRUSS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of September, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, and the decision of the Superior Court is VACATED. The matter is REMANDED to the Superior Court for consideration of Petitioner’s sentencing claim in light of this Court’s decision in Commonwealth v. Foster, 17 A.3d 332 (Pa.2011) (plurality).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
30 A.3d 380
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Jay J. DRUSS, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 26, 2011.
